channel.title: Arthur Schopenhauer on un01s notes
channel.description: Recent content in Arthur Schopenhauer on un01s notes

item.title: some quotes on truth, time, and others
item.description: “Only those who have the patience to do simple things perfectly will acquire the skill to do difficult things easily.” – Friedrich Schiller “The truth is generally seen, rarely heard.” – Baltasar Gracian “Conquer yourself rather than the world.” – Rene Descartes “One should use common words to say uncommon things.” – Arthur Schopenhauer “Hang on to your youthful enthusiasms – you’ll be able to use them better when you’re older.
